name: Gilford Ting
blurb: You'll probably find Gilford either making terrible puns, reading, writing, teaching, optimizing miniscule everyday tasks (like opening doors), or procrastinating by having good conversations with friends! :D

name: Nicholas Wei
blurb: Nicholas enjoys going on hikes, staring at plants and bugs, and embarrassing other Syncos in the hallways.

name: Sarah Park
blurb: If you hear someone singing down dorm row after sunset, it's probably Sarah. Other than that, she's always down for a snowball fight in the winter :)

name: Austin Chen
blurb: Austin can often be found scooting around campus and playing poker. He  enjoys hiking, exploring, and staying curious.

name: Catherine Zhu
songs: Man Tian Xing Chen Bu Ji Ni
blurb: Catherine can often be found doing random things that probably aren't the best use of her time. But hey, who cares.

name: Alice Liu
blurb: Alice enjoys reading, making matcha lattes, and exploring cute cafes around Boston.

name: Michelle Wei
blurb: Besides singing, Michelle enjoys playing volleyball, listening to music, and spending time with friends.

name: Raina Wu
blurb: When she isn't drowning in psets or other work, Raina likes to doodle, read fantasy books, and do math problems with her little brother.

name: Victoria Hu
blurb: Outside of Synco, Victoria also likes contemporary dance, cooking (burning) things with friends, and crashing out in stud 5 loud.

name: Chengyu Li
major: Course 11-6 (Urban Science & Planning with Computer Science)
blurb: Chengyu likes to watch a lot of C-drama and is often (and perhaps chronically) online. If you spot a Chengyu in the wild, be careful. She might reference a dead internet meme at you.

name: Henry Jiang
blurb: Henry is also a fan of making very bad jokes (and occasionally good ones), and also does random geography trivia. He also ends too many sentences with lol, lol.

name: Isabelle Chan
blurb: Isabelle loves plants and has over 600 levels completed in Tomb of the Mask. She is always down to get frozen yogurt!

name: Minghao Zou
blurb: Minghao is a physicist and amateur poet. He loves starry skies, mountain trails, and sharing laughter with friends :)

name: Sophie Cheung
blurb: Sophie likes to run, bake, and drink matcha.
